name: Star Action
description:
The name's Star Action.... Star... what?

Simple rule: Just defeat the enemy ship with your weaponry!

Playtime: ~1 minute per round

Controls: Mouse only, few buttons

Difficulty Levels: Easy, Medium, Difficult (with EasterEgg ending)... Or try an endless wave and see how many enemies you can beat!

Your ship recharges energy continuously for a real-time action experience (inspired by FinalFantasy's Action Time Battle system):

  • Defense Shield: 25% Energy
  • Basic Laser Attack: 25% Energy
  • Rocket Attack: 50% Energy
  • EMP: 75% Energy
  • Ultimate Attack: 100% Energy

Keep in mind, the enemy has also some skills...

For best GFX and Visuals: Download the Windows version.

Sound volumes can be adjusted in the options menu (ESC, or use button on top right corner).

Important: If you liked it, please rate it up... or leave a comment... or both :)
